statements: SELECT * FROM legislative_documents ORDER BY document_title ASC;
SELECT document_title, document_type FROM legislative_documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_id, document_title, document_type FROM legislative_documents WHERE document_type = 'bill';
SELECT document_title FROM legislative_documents WHERE date_created > '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_id, document_type, date_created FROM legislative_documents ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_title FROM legislative_documents WHERE document_type = 'bill';
SELECT * FROM legislative_documents WHERE document_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_type, date_created FROM legislative_documents WHERE document_type IN ('bill', 'resolution') ORDER BY document_id;
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM legislative_documents WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01' AND date_created < '2023-01-01';
SELECT document_title, document_type FROM legislative_documents WHERE document_title LIKE '%regulation%' ORDER BY document_type ASC, document_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM bills
SELECT bill_title, bill_text FROM bills
SELECT bill_id, bill_title, bill_text FROM bills WHERE bill_id = 1
SELECT resolution_title FROM resolutions
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_title FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE bill_id = 1;
SELECT bill_title, bill_text FROM bills ORDER BY bill_title DESC;
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_title, resolution_text FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM bills JOIN resolutions ON bills.bill_id = resolutions.resolution_id;
SELECT bill_id, bill_title FROM bills WHERE bill_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM bills;
SELECT title, status, sponsor FROM bills WHERE bill_number > 100;
SELECT * FROM resolutions WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT resolution_number, title FROM resolutions ORDER BY introduction_date DESC;
SELECT bill_number, title, sponsor FROM bills WHERE sponsor = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE sponsor = 'Alice' ORDER BY introduction_date DESC;
SELECT bill_id, title, status FROM bills WHERE status IN ('Pending', 'Approved') AND introduction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_number, title, sponsor FROM resolutions WHERE sponsor = 'Bob' ORDER BY resolution_number ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT bill_number, title, sponsor FROM bills JOIN resolutions ON bills.bill_id = resolutions.resolution_id WHERE bills.status = 'Pending';

SELECT d.document_type_name, b.title, b.sponsor, r.title AS resolution_title FROM document_types d JOIN bills b ON d.document_type_id = b.bill_id JOIN resolutions r ON d.document_type_id = r.resolution_id WHERE r.status = 'Passed' ORDER BY b.title ASC;
SELECT * FROM Bills;
SELECT bill_id, bill_number, title, status FROM Bills WHERE status = 'Draft';
SELECT title, introduced_date FROM Resolutions ORDER BY introduced_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, party, district FROM Legislators WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT committee_id, committee_name, chairperson_id FROM Committees WHERE formation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Bills WHERE status = 'Draft';
SELECT bill_number, title, introduced_date FROM Bills WHERE introduced_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Resolutions WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY resolution_id DESC;
SELECT resolution_number, title, content FROM Resolutions WHERE resolution_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT full_name, party, state FROM Legislators WHERE party = 'Republican' ORDER BY state, full_name;
SELECT * FROM bills
SELECT bill_name, created_date FROM bills
SELECT resolution_title, resolution_text FROM resolutions
SELECT * FROM bill_versions ORDER BY version_date DESC
SELECT * FROM resolutions_history WHERE action_by = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE bill_id = 1;
SELECT bill_name, bill_description FROM bills WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT bill_name, bill_description, created_date FROM bills WHERE last_modified_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT bill_name, bill_description, created_date, last_modified_date FROM bills ORDER BY created_date DESC, last_modified_date ASC;
SELECT b.bill_name, b.bill_description, b.created_date, r.resolution_title FROM bills b JOIN resolutions r ON b.bill_id = r.resolution_id;
